publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4948 Carolyn Leckie: Attacks on Fire Engine Crewsâ€”That the Parliament condemns the recent stone-throwing attack on a fire fighter in Ayrshire and the rising number of such attacks in the Strathclyde area and calls for more funding and resources to be made available by the Scottish Executive to local fire services to allow more work with local schools and youth groups to highlight the invaluable work performed by fire fighters and to build bridges between emergency service workers and local youths. Supported by: Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Tommy Sheridan*, Frances Curran*, Rosie Kane*, Robin Harper*, Campbell Martin*, John Swinburne*, Chris Ballance*, Shiona Baird*
S2M-4948 Attacks on Fire Engine Crews (lodged on 12 October 2006) John Scott*
S2M-4948 Attacks on Fire Engine Crews (lodged on 12 October 2006) Donald Gorrie* Contents An A B C D E F G H I J
